menu-club: This is the Club menu where you can find various club-related options.
menu-play: This is the Play menu where you can start playing games.
menu-practice: This is the Practice menu where you can find practice options.
menu-tv: This is the TV menu where you can watch live games.
menu-vip: This is the VIP menu where you can access VIP features.
menu-notifications: This is where you will receive notifications.
menu-user: This is your user menu where you can access your profile and settings.
